title: Patcher constantly saying I'm offline even though I have internet connection
body: Patcher constantly saying I'm offline even though I have internet connection. In the off chance it doesn't, when i get past the login screen my chat is disconnected and my icon is black and i can't click the play button.

replies.body: Your network sounds like it might be having some problems when it's trying to bridge a connection to our servers for some reason. Since the chat won't connect either, we probably need to do some troubleshooting to make sure everything is still properly configured in your [**network settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Run through that guide, and let me know if that works better in a custom game.
